Resume.description: UX Design Intern. Gaining hands-on experience in UX Design by working on real-world projects, conducting user research, creating wireframes etc.
A comprehensive 12-month full-stack web development program, including work-integrated training focusing on both technical skills and soft skills development.
High school attended. Matriculated with a bachelor's pass.

Testimonials.name: Haanim Pietersen
Testimonials.message: Ammara Hoosen is a kind, hardworking and intelligent student and friend. She is a good team player and is good at helping anyone when they have a problem. She also has a kind heart and treats everyone the same with respect and love. I would recommend her if you are looking for someone that works well with designing websites and helping it gain loads of attention from all crowds.

Testimonials.name: Chrishano Burns
Testimonials.message: Ammara is honestly a great person to have besides when it comes to coding. Her passion and desire to work hard and get things done inspire everyone around us. A skillful woman with such an intelligent mind has boosted everyone with happiness and her quick learning has helped a lot of us.

Testimonials.name: Eighton-Lee Paulse
Testimonials.message: Ammara is not only a genuinely kind person but also an exceptionally dedicated and hardworking individual. Her clear sense of purpose in life is truly inspiring, and her work ethic is second to none. I wholeheartedly recommend her as a developer.

Testimonials.name: Nis-shaat Galfieldien
Testimonials.message: Ammara Hoosen is a great person with an amazing personality.She's is a great team player who works well with others around her. She's also kind, grounded and diligent. I would highly recommend her.

Testimonials.name: Heather Mtuedwa
Testimonials.message: Ammara is someone who is always looking for to enhance her skills and go the extra mile to learn different things, she is always dedicated to completing every task she gets on time and making sure she does it to the best of her abilities. Ammara is a great positive person to have around to motivate you and to help you keep moving forward.

Testimonials.name: Matthew Dean Brown
Testimonials.message: Ammara is hardworking and always strives for excellence in her field of expertise. She is confident and works well in a team.I would recommend Ammara as she is a great asset to a team and will always help where she can.
